== Introduction ==
The '''Lubuntu OPs Team''' is a group of community volunteers responsible for keeping the Lubuntu IRC channels family friendly and within the bounds of the guidelines. 

== How to help ==
You can help this team by generally helping the people that ask questions in #lubuntu, and while having fun in #lubuntu-offtopic making sure it doesn't get out of hand. There are some <nowiki>[[http://freenode.net/channel_guidelines.shtml|channel]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/IRC/Guidelines|guidelines]]</nowiki> and the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/conduct/|Code of Conduct]]</nowiki> to follow, as well as being a good <nowiki>[[http://freenode.net/catalysts.shtml|catalyst]]</nowiki>.
